trigger.text: If your leader has the (Egghead) type and your opponent has 6 or more cards in their hand, your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand.

effect.text: If your leader has the (Egghead) type and your opponent has 6 or more cards in their hand, your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' in image, but rarity and ID are legible.
